meanings.definition: A South American plant whose leaves are used to make a stimulating drink.
meanings.sent1: The yerba plant grows in South America.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy drinking yerba tea in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The yerba plant must really love the warm climate in South America.
meanings.sent4: Her energy was like a cup of yerba tea, always refreshing and invigorating.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of yerba leaves filled the air, awakening my senses.

meanings.definition: A type of tea made from the leaves of the yerba plant.
meanings.sent1: Yerba tea is a popular beverage in South America.
meanings.sent2: I like to add a splash of milk to my yerba tea.
meanings.sent3: The yerba tea party was a hit with all the guests.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a soothing cup of yerba tea on a stressful day.
meanings.sent5: The rich flavor of yerba tea lingered on my taste buds.
